summary: An ordinance establishing, modifying and abrogating certain positions in the Park, Lighting, Executive, Engineering, Building and Police Depts. and in the Offices of the City Comptroller and the Purchasing Agen; fixing compensation; superseding Ordinance 92600 insofar as in conflict; providing funds by budget item transfers, appropriations and reimbursable appropriations from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
